servinfo.title: P/S Pump Disassembly and Assembly (M16A Model)

ptxt.intxrefpoff: P/S Pump Removal and Installation (M16A Model)

s1.ptxt: Clean its exterior thoroughly.
With aluminum plates placed on vise first, grip pump body (15) with it.
Remove suction connector bolt, suction connector (1) and O-ring (2) from pump body (15).
Remove pressure switch (3) from pump body (15).
Remove plug (6), flow control spring (5) and flow control valve (relief valve) (4) from pump body (15).
Remove cover bolts, pump cover (7) and O-ring (2) from pump body (15).
Remove snap ring (11) from pump shaft (13).
Remove vanes (9) from rotor (10).
Remove cam ring (8), rotor (10), side plate (12) and O-rings (2) from pump body (15).
Pull out pulley (13) from pump body (15).
Remove oil seal (14) from pump body (15).

ptxt.intxrefpoff: P/S Pump Inspection (M16A, J24B and N32A Models)

s1.ptxt: Apply grease to oil seal (1) lip and apply power steering fluid to sliding surface of the shaft (2) then insert pulley’s shaft (2) from oil seal side of the pump body.
Apply power steering fluid to O-rings (1) and fit them to pump body.
Install side plate (1) and cam ring (3) to pump body.

attention3.ptxt: Carefully align the dowel pins on the cam ring (3) and side plate (1) at bolt hole (2) as shown in the figure.

s1.ptxt: Apply power steering fluid to sliding surface of rotor (1).
Install rotor (1) to shaft, directing dot (3) marked side of rotor facing up.
Install new snap ring (2) to shaft, then make sure to fit snap into shaft groove securely.

attention3.ptxt: Never reuse the removed snap ring (2).

s1.ptxt: Apply power steering fluid to sliding surface of cam ring (1).
Apply power steering fluid to each vane (2).
Install vanes (2) (10 pieces) to rotor (1).
Apply power steering fluid to O-ring (1).
Install O-ring (1) to pump body.
Apply power steering fluid to sliding surface of pump cover and rotor.
Match the dowel pins (1) to the holes of the pump cover (2) as shown and install pump cover to pump body.
Gradually tighten pump cover (1) bolts to diagonally specified torque.

attention3.ptxt: After installing pump cover (1), check to make sure that shaft can be turned by hand.

s1.ptxt: Apply power steering fluid to O-ring (2) of pressure switch.
Install O-ring (2) to pressure switch.
Install pressure switch (1) to pump body.
Apply power steering fluid to flow control valve (relief valve).
Install flow control valve (relief valve) to pump body.
Install flow control valve spring.
Apply power steering fluid to O-rings of plug.
Install O-rings to plug.
Tighten plug to specified torque.
Apply power steering fluid to O-ring (2) of suction connector (1).
Install O-ring (2) to suction connector (1).
Install suction connector (1) to pump body as shown in the figure.
Tighten suction connector (1) bolts to specified torque.
